main: ^Finally we get to speak to each other.
tryAndSpeak: ^Try to talk. You should be able to do it now.
respondingToHello: ^Hi. It's nice to finally be able to talk to you.
howComeICanTalkNow: ^I don't know. For some reason you just gained this ability.
^Just like me and the other statues. We couldn't communicate until now.
couldITalkThisWholeTime: ^Nope. For some reason you just gained this ability.
^Just like me and the other statues. We couldn't communicate until now.
endOfJourney: ^I'm afraid we won't get to know each other too well.
^This is the end of your journey.

c-0: ^This is just it. There's nothing beyond this last space.
^I don't know much. I've never been able to go anywhere else or see other places. But I know that once you go past here, there's nothing more.
^I hope you enjoyed the journey so far.

thatsIt: ^You still have to get out the same way. Gather the three keys and blah blah blah.
^But now you know you don't have to rush.
^You finally have the ability to talk to others here.
^He really wants to talk to you, even though he pretends to be tough.
^He even stole and hid one of the keys. So that you would have to talk to him.
^Good luck on the rest of your journey. No matter what it may or may not be.
^And try and make the most of it.
nearTheEnd: ^You still have to get out the same way. Gather the three keys and blah blah blah.
^But now you know you don't have to rush.
^You finally have the ability to talk to others here.
^He really wants to talk to you, even though he pretends to be tough.
^He even stole and hid one of the keys. So that you would have to talk to him.
^Good luck on the rest of your journey. No matter what it may or may not be.
^And try and make the most of it.
